source:
%%sql
Select
    posts.PostTypeId
    ,posttypes.Type
    ,min(CreationDate) FirstCreationDate
    ,max(LastActivityDate) LastActivityDate
    ,max(ClosedDate) LastClosedDate
    ,count(ClosedDate) ClosedCount
    ,sum(FavoriteCount) FavoriteCount
    ,sum(CommentCount) CommentCount
    ,sum(AnswerCount) AnswerCount
    ,sum(Score) ScoreTotal
    ,sum(ViewCount) ViewCount
    ,count(1) Posts
FROM raw_stackoverflow.posts
  JOIN raw_stackoverflow.posttypes
    ON posts.PostTypeId = posttypes.Id
  WHERE Type in ('Question', 'Answer')
GROUP BY PostTypeId, Type

%%sql
Select
    posts.PostTypeId
    ,posttypes.Type
    ,posts.Tags
    ,min(CreationDate) FirstCreationDate
    ,max(LastActivityDate) LastActivityDate
    ,max(ClosedDate) LastClosedDate
    ,count(ClosedDate) ClosedCount
    ,sum(FavoriteCount) FavoriteCount
    ,sum(CommentCount) CommentCount
    ,sum(AnswerCount) AnswerCount
    ,sum(Score) ScoreTotal
    ,sum(ViewCount) ViewCount
    ,count(1) Posts
FROM raw_stackoverflow.posts
  JOIN raw_stackoverflow.posttypes
    ON posts.PostTypeId = posttypes.Id
  WHERE Type in ('Question', 'Answer')
GROUP BY PostTypeId, Type, Tags
